description:
A tooltip built with the Radix primitive: https://www.radix-ui.com/docs/primitives/components/tooltip

### Example

```jsx
<Widget
  src="near/widget/DIG.Tooltip"
  props={{
    content: "This is my tooltip content.",
    trigger: (
      <Widget src="near/widget/DIG.Button" props={{ label: "Hover Me" }} />
    ),
  }}
/>
```

### Props

`content`
- type: string or JSX
- required
- Content displayed inside the tooltip

`contentProps`
- type: object
- optional
- Radix `Content` props: https://www.radix-ui.com/docs/primitives/components/tooltip#content 

`rootProps`
- type: object
- optional
- Radix `Root` props: https://www.radix-ui.com/docs/primitives/components/tooltip#root

`trigger`
- type: JSX
- required
- Renders the element that will display the tooltip when hovered. This element will be wrapped with a `<span>` styled with `display: inline-block;`.

`wrapperStyle`
- type: object
- optional
- Override styles for the `<span>` element wrapping the `trigger`.
name: DIG.Tooltip
